features: Important: Watch the video and learn the”Designed for" details listed below!
Designed for concrete, brick and wood studs wall (16 & 24 inch studs).
Designed for TVs up to 150 lbs (68 KG) and display sized 32" - 86" (81.3 CM - 218 CM).
Designed for VESA sized from 200x100 MM through 600x400 MM.
Low profile design extends 1.3 inches from the wall
Mounting hardware, mounting template and User manual included.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Amazon Basics Low Profile TV Wall Mount Television Wall Mount TV wall mount allows you attach flat screen televisions to the wall for dynamic, enhanced viewing and a clean appearance. Steel Construction Made of rugged steel, the Amazon Basics television mount offers reliable durability you can trust. Compatibility The TV wall mount is compatible with numerous VESA mounting patterns for a wide variety of television brands. Easy to Install Easy to assemble and install, the TV wall mount comes complete with simple instructions and necessary hardware.

VESA Mounting Positions Fits VESA 200x100, 200x200, 300x200, 300x300,400x200,400x300,400x400,600x400 mm mounting patterns TV Weight Capacity Up to 150 lbs TV Size Ranges Accommodates 32 to 86-inch TVs Materiality/Construction Heavy-duty steel Types of Movement Static against the wall, low-profile Level Correction Horizontal post installation leveling included Distance from Wall Low profile—extends only 1.3 inches from the wall for a clean appearance “What’s In The Box” TV mount,hardware kit,User manual Model AM61FL

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Did the job!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The quality of this bracket is really good! It comes with every thing you need and then some to install it. When I opened it I had my doubts about it being Stong enough for my 70”. But let me tell you. My installer said it’s very study and well made. Also simple and quite straightforward instructions. Hardest thing was lifting the tv! Go ahead and buy it. Great quality at a good cost!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy install, does the job
reviews.reviewText: I bought a wall mount from best buy and paid 3x the price of this one. The directions of the best buy mount were so confusing so I returned it and I'm so glad. This one is much cheaper, easier to install and accommodates my TV without a problem!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good TV mount if you want a slim mount close to the wall
reviews.reviewText: Was originally hesitant on purchasing this, since I have used other brand TV mounts in the past. This wasn't the thickest, most industrial strength mount I used before, but it was more than strong enough to handle a large size LCD screen.The kit came with everything you needed to install, and the install was very easy. This is a very slim mount that allows you to mount the TV very close to the wall. Another HUGE feature that I haven't seen in other mounts, is it has screws on the top to allow you to adjust the level of the TV. So if the level is ever-so-slightly off, it's easy to adjust, and this is AFTER you have mounted the TV.I bought another one of these mounts specifically for another TV in my house based on the experience I had with the first.Pros:* Easy Install* Clear Instructions* Adjustable Level after mounting* SLIM mountCons:* Not free

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice for the price
reviews.reviewText: Does at it says, good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s a nice mount!
reviews.reviewText: This is a solid mount for the price. I didn’t love how the bracket needed to be put together with screws. There’s a little wiggle room with the screws/holes for the bracket where you may not screw it in perfectly straight. However, there are leveling adjustment screws to adjust it once you have the bracket up.I really liked how the bottom part of the bracket snaps into place and has string pull down. Other mounting brackets with screws make it almost impossible to reach the screws at the bottom.The instructions are clear and came with all the necessary hardware I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value and does the job.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this during Black Friday to hold a 65" TV. It was well packaged and easy to install, and gets the job done. I am happy with the purchase. A few notes: Make sure the wall bracket is perfectly level while drilling and tightening bolts. They say to pre-drill wood studs with a 5/32" bit. I found that a 3/16 was better for me. Also, I have not tested the "tilt" feature, which it come with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Basic straight forward great
reviews.reviewText: If you want to hang your television. This is it. Strong basic does exactly what it's designed to do. Nothing less nothing more. Excellent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome TV Mount, a gorilla could swing from this
reviews.reviewText: At first I wasn't too sure as it arrived in kind of small box. It's just split in two for easier shipping. Once you bolt together, it's nice and strong. With its width, you can easily find two studs. I used cabinet screws and this thing is rock solid.Used on fairly heavy 75", 70lbs, but I seriously think it could handle double or triple that weight.Low cost, fast shipping, great functionality. What's not to love.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality, includes lots of screws, washers and bushings
reviews.reviewText: I can recommend this product. It would've been nice to include some sheetrock screws and anchors as well. I do trust the 4 big stud / cement screws that came with the mount, and I understand that sheetrock mounting is not ideal, but on my end I ended up adding extra sheetrock screws to make sure it was secure.My TV's certainly not going anywhere!
Simplemente maravilloso y útil, fácil de instalar

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Because this TV is in a kitchen, I wanted to hang it from the wall, rather than have it on a stand taking up worktop space.It was fairly easy to put together, though I was a little worried about getting it dead straight, as I was drilling into the wall through acoustic panelling.Once I'd got the holes lined up where I wanted them, it was just a matter of screwing the bracket to the wall.It was only after I hung the TV onto bracket that I realised I needn't haver stressed about getting it dead straight on the wall, because there are scre adjusters on the part that goes onto the back of the TV, which allowed me to get it all squared up properly.I fitted the bracket in November 2023 and haven't managed to knock the TV off the wall yet. It sits perfectly where I placed it and if I did want to move it horizontally, the bracket allows me to slide the TV slightly to the left or right.The only niggle I have is with the strings that allow you to release the clips - they have to be tied up to hide them from view - but that is only a small point.
